name: Bastion of the Abyss
description:
A game where you take on the role of the supreme commander of a small planet. You control the planets military to protect it from federation invaders and rogue space leviathans.

A turn based game that is incredible unbalanced at the moment, don't really have time or energy to balance so try to pace yourselves for a good time. You'll want to start off by buying a unit, this costs people, science and scrap. You can earn science and people passively each round, but will earn more + scrap from killing enemies.

Goodluck, post your highscores xD
Made solo in a 48h period but had to submit into Jam due to school.
Note: Mac build currently broken
